title: Same; proof of
context: §578-5 Same; proof of. A return of service of the summons shall be made by the serving officer in the manner prescribed by section 634-22, and be similarly effective. [L 1919, c 3, pt of §1; RL 1925, §3036; RL 1935, §4522; RL 1945, §12273; RL 1955, §331-5; HRS §578-5] Revision Note Section &ldquo;634-22&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;634-58&rdquo;.
